 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָעַף‎</span>] **verb** ==trickle, drip==, synonym of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נזל‎</span>, II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ערף‎</span> (compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***flow*** (of blood), ***bleed*** (of the nose)); — 

**Qal** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִרְעֲפוּ‎</span>, of clouds [[Job.36.28|Job 36:28]] (with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲלֵי‎</span> person; \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִזְּלוּ‎</span>), with accusative of material <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎טַל‎</span> [[Prov.3.20|Prov 3:20]] figurative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַעְגָּלֶיךָ יִרְעֲפוּן דָּ֑שֶׁן‎</span> [[Ps.65.12|Ps 65:12]] (i.e. fertilizing rain); subject of moistened ground, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְאוֺת מִדְבָּר‎</span>, v[[Ps.65.13|Ps 65:13]]. **Hiph\`il** ***Imperative*** masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַרְעִיפוּ‎</span> [[Isa.45.8|Isa 45:8]] ***trickle***, O heavens, from above (figurative: \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִּוְּלוּ צֶרֶק‎</span>).
